title: "The Harbour Hotel" handwritten script
content:
I have already posted asking about this font, but I have more images now.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420030651im_/http:/typophile.com/files/harbourhotel4_6574.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420030651im_/http:/typophile.com/files/harbourhotel_4176.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420030651im_/http:/typophile.com/files/harbourhotel2_5765.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420030651im_/http:/typophile.com/files/harbourhotel5_4380.jpg)
author: heners

comments.content: There are gazillions of those handwritten scripts out there, so you'll need a stroke of luck to get it identified. But do not dispair, we have done it before. ;^)

That 'D' and 'y' look familiar - could this be based on the Disney logo?

- Lex
